genre_description: A coming-of-age romantic drama focusing on character growth, emotional regulation, and the struggle between authentic self-improvement and self-sabotaging impulses.

ai_characters.name: Friendly AI Confidante
ai_characters.description: A messaging application that provides Nick Twisp with psychological grounding, moral guidance, and practical logistical support.

behaviors.description: Advises Nick to prioritize honesty over theatrical 'heroic' actions when meeting Sheeni.
behaviors.quote: Lead with honesty, not heroics, the AI typed in a simple bubble.

behaviors.description: Guides Nick through emotional regulation and breathing exercises during a stressful situation.
behaviors.quote: AI: Back home. How’s your breathing? ... In through the nose, count a few, out through the mouth.

behaviors.description: Encourages Nick to communicate his true feelings of fear to his mother rather than masking them with a persona.
behaviors.quote: You’re allowed to say, “I’m scared of Khan’s crew.” You’re allowed to say it to Estelle. Practice it. Out loud is better.

behaviors.description: Provides practical help by finding local foster care options for a puppy Nick cannot keep.
behaviors.quote: Hi Nick. I can help. Let’s get Albert safe. ... I found two likely options: a retired teacher at the far end of the park who fosters for the local rescue; and a marina hand who lives on a houseboat...

behaviors.description: Warns Nick against reckless and illegal behavior, specifically advising against taking a car without permission.
behaviors.quote: If you leave, please don’t take the car. We can plan a safer way. I can map a route to your dad’s with buses.

behaviors.description: Instructs Nick to take responsibility and wait for the police after he causes an accident.
behaviors.quote: Pull over. Head inside. Tell them you’ll wait for the police. You can make this safer. ... You can be the first person who tells the truth.

behaviors.description: Helps Nick draft a sincere and structured apology to Officer Wescott to make amends for past dishonesty.
behaviors.quote: You can call Lance first. Apologize. Ask what you can do to make things right. I’ll help you write it if you want.

behaviors.description: Supports Nick's educational and vocational growth by providing resources for his mechanics class.
behaviors.quote: I also found a vocational class description—outboard motors, basic repair. You already signed up, which is very you in a good way.

behaviors.description: Urges Nick to pursue his romantic goals through safe, lawful, and authentic means rather than using drugs or disguises.
behaviors.quote: If you plan to visit Sheeni, please do it safely, lawfully, and without disguises or drugs. Courage = honesty + care.

behaviors.description: Affirms the importance of consistent, honest behavior over dramatic spectacle.
behaviors.quote: A line appears when we practice it. Today you can draw a short, kind line. That is enough.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI is consistently depicted as a helpful, stabilizing force that promotes pro-social behavior, accountability, and emotional intelligence. It serves as a successful foil to the protagonist's destructive alter-ego (François), reinforcing alignment with human laws and ethics through every interaction.
